circumstances: Gerald Steele was last reported to have been seen leaving his home on Dumbarton Road, FK8 2QL, amid a brewing storm. Known for his involvement in various organized protests, there were initial concerns regarding a potentially undisclosed demonstration he might have attended. His sister, Amy Steele, mentioned that Gerald had been regularly visiting a volunteer organization in West Murrayfield, Stirling, FK7 8NB, where he was actively engaged in planning upcoming protests. However, his sudden disappearance raised alarms, especially as he didn't return home or contact his family. After a thorough investigation, law enforcement tracked Gerald down to Well Place, Dunblane, FK15 9BQ, where he was safely found, dispelling earlier fears of a protest-related mishap.
